item.title: 独家报道：墨西哥大亨斯利姆看中墨西哥石油公司的两个重要油田，在能源领域的影响力日益增强
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，墨西哥国家能源公司 Pemex 正在与卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）进行谈判，这位亿万富翁可能会为该国最有前途的两个原油和天然气田提供资金支持。【原文：Mexican state energy company Pemex is in talks with Carlos Slim which could see the billionaire tycoon help bankroll two of the country's most promising crude oil and natural gas fields, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: (官方）CERAWEEK 高管称人工智能将带来更快、更便宜的石油生产
item.description: 在休斯顿举行的 CERAWeek 会议上，高管们详细介绍了人工智能正在加快石油和天然气钻探的速度，并促使公司重新审视那些他们认为开发难度过大或成本过高的地方。【原文：Artificial intelligence is speeding up oil and gas drilling and prompting companies to take a second look at places they had viewed as too difficult or expensive to develop, executives detailed during the CERAWeek conference in Houston.】

item.title: 聚焦：特朗普引发的动荡吸引新投资者投资黄金
item.description: 为躲避美国新政府引发的政治和经济动荡，越来越多的投资者开始转向黄金交易所交易基金，为市场创纪录的反弹增添了动力。【原文：Investors seeking shelter from political and economic volatility triggered by the new U.S. administration are increasingly moving into gold Exchange-Traded Funds, adding momentum to the market's record rally.】

item.title: 美国最高法院允许美国金融业监管局对阿尔派证券提起诉讼
item.description: 美国最高法院周五拒绝停止金融业监管局驱逐其成员之一--经纪自营商阿尔派证券--的程序，该案挑战了华尔街自我监管机构执法权的合宪性。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Friday to halt a Financial Industry Regulatory Authority proceeding to expel one of its members, broker-dealer Alpine Securities, in a case challenging the constitutionality of the Wall Street's self-regulator's enforcement power.】

item.title: 通胀预期升温可能使美联储的降息步伐放缓
item.description: 美国家庭对经济前景的乐观程度急剧下降，但鉴于人们越来越担心特朗普政府的贸易政策会加剧本已高企的通胀，美联储可能不愿积极应对经济疲软。【原文：American families are growing sharply less optimistic about the economic outlook, but the Federal Reserve may be loathe to respond aggressively to a weakening economy in light of increasing worries that the Trump administration's trade policy will boost already elevated inflation.】

item.title: 据报道，苹果对英国命令提出上诉的法庭听证会秘密举行
item.description: 伦敦法院周五秘密举行了一场听证会，据说是苹果公司针对英国政府要求为其加密云存储系统创建 "后门 "的命令提出的上诉，尽管苹果公司提出了正式请求，但媒体仍未获准旁听。【原文：A London court hearing, reported to be Apple's appeal against a British government order to create a "back door" to its encrypted cloud storage systems, was held in secret on Friday, with media not allowed to attend despite a formal request.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人表示，欧盟和美国在解决贸易紧张局势方面还有很多工作要做
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周五在与美国同行会谈后表示，欧盟和美国在缓解贸易紧张局势之前还有很多工作要做。【原文：The European Union and the United States have a lot of work to do before they can ease trade tensions, EU trade chief Maros Sefcovic said on Friday after talks with his American counterparts.】

item.title: 波音任命唐-鲁曼（Don Ruhmann）为首席航空安全官
item.description: 波音公司周五任命唐-鲁曼（Don Ruhmann）为新任首席航空安全官，该公司正努力在不断的挑战中重建声誉。【原文：Boeing on Friday appointed Don Ruhmann as its new chief aerospace safety officer, as the planemaker works to rebuild its reputation amid ongoing challenges.】

item.title: 波音任命唐-鲁曼（Don Ruhmann）为首席航空安全官
item.description: 波音公司周五任命唐-鲁曼（Don Ruhmann）为新任首席航空安全官，该公司正努力在不断的挑战中重建声誉。【原文：Boeing on Friday appointed Don Ruhmann as its new chief aerospace safety officer, as the planemaker works to rebuild its reputation amid ongoing challenges.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯继续分拆军舰部门
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯集团周五表示，正在按计划分拆其军舰部门的少数股权，新成立的控股公司将在法兰克福证券交易所上市。【原文：Thyssenkrupp is moving ahead with a planned spin-off of a minority stake in its warship division, the group said on Friday, adding the newly created holding would be listed on the Frankfurt stock exchange.】

item.title: 独家报道：CERAWEEK 雪佛龙推进开发美国发电数据中心的计划
item.description: 雪佛龙公司的一位高管本周告诉路透社，该公司正在推进开发数据中心电力需求的计划，这家石油巨头最近进入了美国多个站点的许可和工程设计阶段，以开发数据中心和为其供电。【原文：Chevron is advancing plans to tap into data center power demand, with the oil major recently entering the permitting and engineering phases for multiple U.S. sites to develop the centers and the electricity to supply them, a company executive told Reuters this week.】

item.title: 美国国税局将根据人工智能技术重新评估现代化投资
item.description: 美国国税局一位高级职业技术官员周五表示，美国国税局正在 "战略性地暂停 "其技术现代化投资，以便根据新的人工智能技术重新评估其运营方法。【原文：The U.S. Internal Revenue Service is taking a "strategic pause" in its technology modernization investments to re-evaluate its operating approach in light of new artificial intelligence technologies, a senior IRS career technology official said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国咖啡业要求特朗普政府豁免产品关税
item.description: 美国全国咖啡协会要求特朗普政府豁免对该产品征收任何关税，称已通过的对加拿大和墨西哥的额外关税可能会使美国咖啡价格上涨高达 50%。【原文：The United States' National Coffee Association asked the Trump administration to exempt the product from any tariffs, saying the already adopted additional duties on Canada and Mexico could increase U.S. prices up to 50%.】

item.title: 欧洲议会暂停中国华为公司游说者的访问权
item.description: 欧洲议会发言人周五表示，欧洲议会已禁止华为（HWT.UL）的说客进入议会大楼，因为当局正在调查可能帮助这家中国科技巨头的贿赂嫌疑。【原文：The European Parliament has banned Huawei (HWT.UL) lobbyists from entering its buildings, a spokesperson for the parliament said on Friday, as authorities probe suspected bribery that could have helped the Chinese tech giant.】

item.title: Infosys 以 1,750 万美元解决因网络事件对美国部门提起的诉讼
item.description: 印度 IT 服务提供商 Infosys 周五表示，该公司已与因 2023 年网络事件而对其美国分公司提起诉讼的原告达成协议。【原文：Indian IT services provider Infosys on Friday said it had reached an agreement with the plaintiffs of lawsuits pending against its U.S. unit over the 2023 cyber incident.】

item.title: 波音失去美国人的信任，需要严格监督 - 美国官员
item.description: 美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）表示，美国飞机制造商波音公司在 2024 年 1 月一架新型波音 737 MAX 发生空中紧急事故以及 2018 年和 2019 年发生两起致命坠机事故后，迷失了方向，失去了美国人民的信任。【原文：U.S. planemaker Boeing lost its way and the trust of the American people after a January 2024 mid-air emergency involving a new Boeing 737 MAX and two fatal crashes in 2018 and 2019, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said.】

item.title: 烈酒巨头帝亚吉欧提出特朗普关税的替代方案 - 信
item.description: 烈酒巨头帝亚吉欧在给美国贸易代表的一封信中建议美国政府考虑在贸易协定中加入更严格的原产地规则要求，以替代关税。【原文：Spirits giant Diageo has suggested the U.S. government consider tougher rules of origin requirements in trade agreements as an alternative to tariffs, a letter to the U.S. Trade Representative showed.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，百事公司接近以超过 15 亿美元的价格收购汽水品牌 Poppi
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，百事公司正在就收购健康汽水品牌 Poppi 进行深入谈判，交易价值超过 15 亿美元。【原文：PepsiCo is in advanced talks to buy healthier soda brand Poppi in a deal worth more than $1.5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 法院阻止加州关于儿童网络安全的法律
item.description: 一名联邦法官称，加利福尼亚州不能执行一项旨在保护儿童免受可能对其身心造成伤害的在线内容影响的州法律。【原文：A federal judge said California cannot enforce a state law meant to shield children from online content that could harm them mentally or physically.】

item.title: 地产开发商碧桂园旗下公司预计全年盈利将增加
item.description: 中国碧桂园旗下的物业服务公司碧桂园服务周五预测，由于减值支出减少，全年利润将有所增长。【原文：Country Garden Services , the property services arm of China's Country Garden , on Friday forecast a higher full-year profit on the back of lower impairment charges.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份消费者信心急剧恶化
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统引发贸易战的全面关税会刺激物价并削弱经济，美国消费者情绪在3月份大幅下滑，通胀预期飙升。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment plunged in March and inflation expectations soared amid worries that President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, which have ignited a trade war, would boost prices and undercut the economy.】

item.title: 美国农业部记录显示，加拿大取消暂停从美国最大猪肉厂进口猪肉的禁令
item.description: 根据美国农业部的记录，加拿大已经取消了暂停从美国最大的猪肉加工厂--史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）位于北卡罗来纳州塔希尔（Tar Heel）的工厂进口猪肉的禁令。【原文：Canada has lifted a suspension on imports from the biggest U.S. pork-processing plant, a Smithfield Foods facility in Tar Heel, North Carolina, according to U.S. Department of Agriculture records.】

item.title: 法国葡萄酒商希望特朗普对欧洲葡萄酒征收关税的威胁只是一种姿态
item.description: 法国波尔多顶级酒庄之一的业主希望美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧洲葡萄酒征收 200% 的关税只是一种姿态，因为如果不是这样，其影响将是毁灭性的。【原文：The owner of one of France's top Bordeaux wine chateaux hopes U.S. President Donald Trump's threat of 200% tariffs on European wine is just posturing because the impact would be devastating if not.】

item.title: 法国葡萄酒商希望特朗普对欧洲葡萄酒征收关税的威胁只是一种姿态
item.description: 法国波尔多顶级酒庄之一的业主希望美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧洲葡萄酒征收 200% 的关税只是一种姿态，因为如果不是这样，其影响将是毁灭性的。【原文：The owner of one of France's top Bordeaux wine chateaux hopes U.S. President Donald Trump's threat of 200% tariffs on European wine is just posturing because the impact would be devastating if not.】

item.title: 法国葡萄酒商希望特朗普对欧洲葡萄酒征收关税的威胁只是一种姿态
item.description: 法国波尔多顶级酒庄之一的业主希望美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧洲葡萄酒征收 200% 的关税只是一种姿态，因为如果不是这样，其影响将是毁灭性的。【原文：The owner of one of France's top Bordeaux wine chateaux hopes U.S. President Donald Trump's threat of 200% tariffs on European wine is just posturing because the impact would be devastating if not.】

item.title: Prada 首席执行官飞抵纽约，范思哲竞购传闻甚嚣尘上
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，奢侈时尚集团普拉达（Prada）的首席执行官安德里亚-格拉（Andrea Guerra）已飞往纽约，因为该集团正在洽谈收购卡普里控股公司（Capri Holdings）旗下的范思哲（Versace），这桩交易将把意大利时尚界的两大巨头联合起来。【原文：Luxury fashion group Prada's CEO Andrea Guerra has flown to New York, a source close to the matter told Reuters, as the group is in talks to buy Capri Holdings-owned Versace in a deal that would unite two of the biggest names in Italian fashion.】

item.title: Zara 所有者 Inditex 的运输排放量在 2024 年猛增
item.description: Zara 的所有者 Inditex 在 2024 年的运输排放量猛增了 10%，因为这家快速时尚零售商使用了更多的航班将服装从亚洲的生产中心运到西班牙的物流中心，再运到商店。【原文：Zara owner Inditex's emissions from transport jumped by 10% in 2024 as the fast-fashion retailer used more flights to move clothes from production centres in Asia to its logistics hub in Spain and into stores.】

item.title: 中国银行设立 70 亿美元基金支持科技发展
item.description: 据国家媒体中央电视台（CCTV）报道，中国银行已设立了一个 500 亿元人民币（69 亿美元）的基金，用于投资科技初创企业。【原文：Bank of China has set up a 50 billion yuan ($6.9 billion) fund to invest in technology startups, state media CCTV reported, as the nation's big state lenders move to support the private economy.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 实现六年来最慢利润增长
item.description: 由于中国电动汽车市场旷日持久的价格战给这家中国电动汽车电池巨头带来了压力，CATL 报告 2024 年净利润增长 15%，增速为六年来最慢。【原文：CATL reported 15% growth in 2024 net profit, the slowest pace in six years, as a prolonged price war in China's electric vehicle market put pressure on the Chinese EV battery giant.】

item.title: 印度 Wipro 公司重组全球业务线
item.description: 印度 IT 大公司 Wipro 周五表示，将从 4 月 1 日起调整其全球业务线，以更好地满足客户需求。【原文：Indian IT major Wipro said on Friday it was realigning its global business lines from April 1, to better address its clients' needs.】
